short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace boring Apache/nginx directory listing with fancy directory listing with keyboard navigation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace boring Apache/nginx directory listing with fancy directory listing with keyboard navigation

Key Features
- Works out of the box
- Support Apache and nginx directory listings
- Fancy UI
- Keyboard navigation
